data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Roi Et.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Roi Et, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Roi Et, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,411,100 citizens of Roi Et, Thailand, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Roi Et to agree with you and with one another.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Huay people.
Jesus, please help the 9,124 believers in the state of Roi Et to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, give the disciples of the the state of Roi Et an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Roi Et.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
